item.title: Steve Jobs (and Neuroscience) Says This Is What Makes Remarkably Intelligent People Different
item.description: According to Jobs, highly intelligent people excel at making connections others don’t. How?

item.description: Conflict is inevitable, but how you handle it in a family enterprise is a choice.

item.title: How Entrepreneurs Can Build Customer-Centered Businesses
item.description: No matter the industry, the objective remains the same: building something that truly improves the life of your customer.

item.description: You will face situations when you feel underpaid, or disrespected. The key is how you respond.

item.title: Perfect Your LinkedIn Profile in Just 7 Easy Steps
item.description: Studies show the brain forms judgments about competence and trustworthiness in milliseconds.
